abstract: Amgen said today that its anemia drug Aranesp did not increase the death rate of lung cancer patients in a closely watched clinical trial.
snippet: Amgen said today that its anemia drug Aranesp did not increase the death rate of lung cancer patients in a closely watched clinical trial.
lead_paragraph: In an announcement that could dispel at least some of the recent safety concerns over a widely used class of drugs, Amgen said today that its anemia drug Aranesp did not increase the death rate of lung cancer patients in a closely watched clinical trial.

headline.main: Study Supports Use of Anemia Drug From Amgen
